item.title: XPath Tester using Web Apps Created by Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists In this post, I would like to introduce the xpath tester using Web Apps created by Google Apps Script. Demo Usage 1. Prepare Google Spreadsheet. Please create new Google Spreadsheet on your Google Drive. 2. Enable Sheets API. Please open the script editor at the created new Spreadsheet and enable Sheets API at Advanced Google services. 3. Prepare sample script. Please copy and paste the following script to the script editor on the created new Spreadsheet and save it.
